net.sharemycode.service

Class ResourceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sharemycode.service.ResourceService

  • @Path(value="/resources")
public class ResourceService
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourceService - Defines all RESTful services relating to Resource entities
    Author:
    Lachlan Archibald

      • createUserAuthorisation

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{id:[0-9]*}/access/")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createUserAuthorisation(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String resourceId,
                                                                                                                                         ResourceAccess access)
                                                                                                                                  throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Authorises a User to access a ProjectResource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - Long ProjectResource id
        access - ResourceAccess with userId and AccessLevel
        Returns:
        Response.created() with URI
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if created URI is invalid

      • updateUserAuthorisation

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{id:[0-9]*}/access/{userId:([0-9a-zA-Z]|-)*}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateUserAuthorisation(@PathParam(value="id")

                                                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="userId")

                                                                                                                                                                 ResourceAccess access)
        Updates authorisation for a User to access a ProjectResource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - Long ProjectResource id
        userId - String userId
        access - ResourceAccess containing updated AccessLevel
        Returns:
        Response.ok()

      • updateResourceContent

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{id:[0-9]*}/content")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateResourceContent(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                 java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                 java.lang.String data)
        Publishes ProjectResource update to content
        Parameters:
        id - Long ProjectResource id
        data - Base64Encoded String data
        Returns:
        Response.ok() if successful, else Response.notModified()
